Sentencas: Improving the power density of SOFC stacks will accelerate their integration into mobile applications.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We developed a 3D Multiphysics model validated by experimental results from early studies to examine the effect of radial and circumferential flows on the power density improvements in a micro-tubular SOFC.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The inserts were placed inside the fuel channel to generate flow in different directions.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The effects of geometric parameters of these inserts on flow and mass transfer in the fuel channel and porous anode were analyzed.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We demonstrate that the radial flow enables the fuel to penetrate directly into the porous anode, increasing the local fuel concentration and enhancing the fuel diffusion to the anode triple-phase boundaries.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: We found that the circumferential flow has a negligible effect on the diffusion process in the anode and on the increase in power density.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The impact of local convective and diffusive mass transfer mechanisms on power density improvement is analyzed using the local Peclet number along the axial direction.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Enlarging the radial velocity component perpendicular to the porous anode could effectively increase the power density of the micro-tubular SOFC by 37%.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This study helps improve our understanding of mass transfer in fuel channels and helps build a foundation for SOFC channel designs and optimizations.
Titulo: Effects of Radial and Circumferential Flows on Power Density Improvements of Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
